tasks.check:size: deno task build && deno run -A scripts/checks/check-bundle-size.mjs
tasks.assets:optimize: deno run -A npm:svgo src/assets/networks/*.svg src/assets/coins/*.svg src/assets/providers/*.svg
tasks.assets: deno task assets:sync && deno task assets:optimize
tasks.test: deno task test:unit && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:unit: deno run -A scripts/test/generate-importmap.ts && deno test -A --no-check --import-map=deno.test.importmap.json $(cat scripts/test/deno-unit-specs.txt) && node node_modules/.bin/vitest run
tasks.test:e2e:prompt: deno run -A npm:@playwright/test test e2e/prompt-input.test.ts -c playwright.no-server.config.ts
